mapper.select: select cls.cid, course.cname as course, teacher.tname as teacher, schedule.day, schedule.start_session, schedule.end_session, schedule.address from cls join course join stu_cls join teacher join schedule on cls.clsid = schedule.clsid and cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid and stu_cls.clsid = cls.clsid where stu_cls.sid = #{stuid,jdbcType=CHAR} and schedule.start_week <= #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER} and schedule.end_week >= #{week,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by schedule.start_session

select cls.cid, course.cname as name, teacher.tname as teacher, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour from cls join course join stu_cls join teacher join departmet on cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid and stu_cls.clsid = cls.clsid and course.did = departmet.did where stu_cls.sid = #{stuid,jdbcType=CHAR}

select cls.cid, course.cname as name, teacher.tname as teacher, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour from cls join course join teacher join departmet join student on cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid and course.did = student.did and course.did = departmet.did where student.sid = #{stuid,jdbcType=CHAR}

select cls.cid, cls.clsid, course.cname as name, teacher.tname as teacher, departmet.dname as department, course.credit, course.hour from cls join course join teacher join departmet on cls.cid = course.cid and cls.tid = teacher.tid and course.did = departmet.did where teacher.tname like '%${tname}%'
select msg_id as id, s.sname as stu_name, content, reply, create_time, reply_time from message join student s on message.sid = s.sid where s.sid = #{stuid,jdbcType=CHAR} limit 0, 10

select stu_cls.clsid, course.cid, course.cname as course, course.credit, t.tname as teacher, stu_cls.usual_grade, stu_cls.final_grade, stu_cls.create_time as grade_time from stu_cls join cls join course join teacher t on cls.tid = t.tid and stu_cls.clsid=cls.clsid and cls.cid=course.cid where stu_cls.sid = #{stuid,jdbcType=CHAR} limit 0, 10
